page.title: 04ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: NEARLY EVERYONE WE KNOW HAS AT LEAST ONE TELEVISION SET AND RADIO.SEVERAL PEOPLE NOWADAYS USE A VIDEO TO RECORD TELEVISION PROGRAMMES OR TO VIEW FILMS.ANOTHER POPULAR FORM OF ENTERTAINMENT IS A VISIT TO THE CINEMA APPROXIMATELY ONCE A MONTH FOR MOST CHILDREN.SEVERAL CHILDREN VISIT THE LOCAL "PALACE THEATRE" THIS HAS AN AMATEUR THEATRE COMPANY.MANY ADULTS IN OUR AREA USE THE"BATCHLEY SOCIAL CLUB".MANY CHILDREN BELONG TO VARIOUS CLUBS,FOR EXAMPLE CUBS AND SCOUTS FOR THE BOYS,BROWNIES AND GUIDES FOR THE GIRLS.SPORTING EVENTS ARE POPULAR,BOTH FOR WATCHING AND PARTICIPATING.FOR{ {SPECIAL OCCASIONS}AND PARTIES FAMILIES WILL VISIT ONE OF THE LOCAL RESTAURANTS FOR A MEAL.THERE ARE CLUBS FOR SPECIFIC GROUPS,FOR EXAMPLE,DARBY AND JOAN CLUB(OVER 60s);ALSO CLUBS FOR PEOPLE WITH SOME HANDICAP.
